sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import {useTranslation } from "react-i18next"; import i18next from "i18next"; import cookies from "js-cookie"; import './App.css'; const languages = [ { code: 'vn', name: 'Tiếng Việt', country_code: 'vn', }, { code: 'en', name: 'Tiếng Anh', country_code: 'gb', }, ] const GlobeIcon = ({width = 24, height = 24}) => ( ) const ListIcon = ({width = 24, height = 24}) => ( ) const MapIcon = ({width = 18, height = 18}) =>( ) const PhoneIcon = ({width = 18, height = 18}) =>( ) const EmailIcon = ({width = 18, height = 18}) =>( ) function App() { const currentLanguageCode = cookies.get('i18next') || 'en' const currentLanguage = languages.find(l => l.code === currentLanguageCode) const { t } = useTranslation() useEffect(() => { document.title = t('app_title') }, [currentLanguage, t]) return (
{t('log_in')}
{t('Register')} {t('Forgot_password')}
< GlobeIcon />
  • {t('language')}
    • {languages.map(({ code, name, country_code}) => (
    • ))}

{t('check_title')}

{t('test_notice')}
{/* ----Tên sản phẩm và đánh giá sản phầm----- */}

{t('Products_name')}

{t('Tax_code')} 4601526690

{t('Send_comment')}
{/* */}
{/* */}
{/* */}
{/* Thông tin sản phẩm */}
{t('Product_information')}

{t('Product_name')}{t('Products_name')}

{t('Place_of_production')}{t('Cooperative')}

{t('Production_process')}{t('Harvesting')}

 {t('Product_information')}

{t('information_1')}

{t('information_2')}

{t('Warehousing')}

{t('Storage_1')}

{t('Storage_2')}

{t('Geographical_indications')}
{t('Captions_1')}
{t('Captions_2')}
{t('Certificate')}

{t('Like_tea')}

{t('Household_Code')} {t('Captions_3')}

{t('Cooperative_SD')}

{t('Type_of_activity')} {t('Cooperative2')}

{t('Tax_code')} 4601526690

{t('Address')} {t('Address_number')}

{t('Legal_representatives')} {t('Name_representatives')}

{t('Tax_code')} 4601526690

{t('First_time_license_date')} 19/10/2018

{t('Phone_number')} 0985880333

{t('Ownership')}
{t('Cooperative')}

{t('Address')} {t('Address_number')}

{t('Phone_number')} 0985880333

Email: Sondungtra@gmail.com

); } export default App;
